div.p:
The Sweeny Independent School District, in partnership with parents and community, will provide a quality education for all students, empowering them to pursue their full intellectual, physical, and social potential and developing them to become productive citizens in an ever-changing, interdependent world.
Open Enrollment in Sweeny ISD
Live anywhere, Learn here
Sweeny ISD is an open enrollment school district, welcoming students who live outside its boundaries to take advantage of small schools and personalized learning without paying tuition.
Enroll Now More Info

Welcome to Sweeny ISD
Home of the Bulldogs

a.title: Go to our Elementary School site
Go to our Junior High site
Go to our High School site

p.style: color: rgb(33, 33, 33); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: justify; font-family: Cambria, serif;

p.span: May 12, 2020 Remote Meeting of the Sweeny ISD Board of Trustees:

p.style: color: rgb(33, 33, 33); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.span:
Pursuant to the Governor Abbott’s Temporary Suspension of Open Meetings Laws issued on March 16, 2020 and consistent with new state and local mandates on public health and social distancing, this Meeting of the Sweeny ISD Board of Trustees will be conducted via Zoom, which will be audible to the Board and public here:
TBA
A quorum of the Board of Trustees will not be physically present at one location, and for safety reason we will not be permitting in-person attendance by members of the public or staff.
If you wish to submit comments for review by the Board of Trustees regarding agenda items for the May 12, 2020 meeting, please complete and submit the form available here https://forms.gle/8wytFBJEAVm8uNGg6
. Comments submitted and received by 4:00 on April 14, 2020 will be available to the Board for review and consideration prior to the meeting

p.style: color: rgb(33, 33, 33); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-family: Cambria, serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: justify; font-family: Cambria, serif;

p.span: A recording of the open meeting will be available for viewing online following the meeting.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Cambria, serif;

div.p:
The primary role of our district is to build the next generation of leaders by empowering Sweeny ISD students to create their future....with pride. It is also our responsibility to ensure that a robust, relevant, and responsive learning system exists to support the personalized needs of each student.
As Superintendent, I believe it is critical for us to unite as one community; ultimately creating a movement where everyone understands and takes ownership of their role in achieving the vision, mission, and goals of SISD. Collaborative decision-making amongst students, staff, parents, and community members will be critical as we embark on this journey together. I look forward to partnering with you as we unite in support of a positive culture and learning environment for our students.
GO DOGS!!!
Dr. Tory C. Hill, Superintendent

div.div: 1310 N. Elm Street, Sweeny, TX 77480 | Phone 979-491-8000 | Fax 979-491-8030
